flavor_text_entries.red:
Its hooves are 10
times harder than
diamonds. It can trample anything
completely flat
in little time.
flavor_text_entries.blue:
Its hooves are 10
times harder than
diamonds. It can trample anything
completely flat
in little time.
flavor_text_entries.yellow:
Capable of jumping
incredibly high.
Its hooves and sturdy legs absorb
the impact of a
hard landing.
flavor_text_entries.gold:
It is a weak run­
ner immediately
after birth. It gradually becomes
faster by chasing
after its parents.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
Its hind legs,
which have hard­
er-than-diamond hooves, kick back
at any presence it
senses behind it.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
Training by
jumping over grass
that grows longer every day has made
it a world-class
jumper.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
PONYTA is very weak at birth.
It can barely stand up.
This POKéMON becomes stronger by stumbling and falling to keep up with
its parent.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
PONYTA is very weak at birth.
It can barely stand up.
This POKéMON becomes stronger by stumbling and falling to keep up with
its parent.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A PONYTA is very weak at birth. It can
barely stand up. Its legs become stronger
as it stumbles and falls while trying to
keep up with its parent.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
Its body is light, and its legs are
incredibly powerful. It can clear
Ayers Rock in one leap.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
Its hooves are ten times harder than
diamond. It can trample anything
completely flat in little time.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
About an hour after birth, its
fiery mane and tail grow out,
giving it an impressive appearance.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
Its legs grow strong while it
chases after its parent. It runs
in fields and mountains all day.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
As a newborn, it can barely stand.
However, through galloping, its
legs are made tougher and faster.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
It is a weak runner immediately
after birth. It gradually becomes
faster by chasing after its parents.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
Its hind legs, which have hooves that
are harder than diamond, kick back
at any presence it senses behind it.
flavor_text_entries.black:
As a newborn, it can barely stand.
However, through galloping, its
legs are made tougher and faster.
flavor_text_entries.white:
As a newborn, it can barely stand.
However, through galloping, its
legs are made tougher and faster.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
As a newborn, it can barely stand.
However, through galloping, its
legs are made tougher and faster.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
As a newborn, it can barely stand.
However, through galloping, its
legs are made tougher and faster.
flavor_text_entries.x:
As a newborn, it can barely stand.
However, through galloping, its
legs are made tougher and faster.
flavor_text_entries.y:
Its legs grow strong while it chases after its parent.
It runs in fields and mountains all day.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Ponyta is very weak at birth. It can barely stand up.
This Pokémon becomes stronger by stumbling and falling to
keep up with its parent.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Ponyta is very weak at birth. It can barely stand up.
This Pokémon becomes stronger by stumbling and
falling to keep up with its parent.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu:
Capable of jumping incredibly high.
Its hooves and sturdy legs absorb
the impact of a hard landing.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-eevee:
Capable of jumping incredibly high.
Its hooves and sturdy legs absorb
the impact of a hard landing.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
It can’t run properly when it’s newly born.
As it races around with others of its kind,
its legs grow stronger.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
If you’ve been accepted by Ponyta, its burning
mane is mysteriously no longer hot to the touch.
flavor_text_entries.legends-arceus:
These Pokémon live in herds out in the grassland. Newborn
foals lack their fiery manes, which will develop about an hour
after birth.
